description: Pubs, restaurants and other hospitality outlets on the island are expected to close until 4 January.
title: Covid: Jersey to enter 'hospitality circuit breaker'
title_page: Covid: Jersey to enter 'hospitality circuit breaker' - BBC News
maintext: Jersey "now stands at an important crossroads in our pandemic response", Senator Le Fondre said, adding: "I know that collectively these measures represent a significant restriction...particularly at this time of year, when we want to be celebrating and spending time with loved ones and friends.
